Class-Warlock 20 — Female Human Warlock: 20
Strength: 12 (1) Dexterity: 12 (1) Constitution: 14 (2) Intelligence: 18 (4) Wisdom: 12 (1) Charisma: 13 (1)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Chaotic Neutral Deity: Greek-Hecate (CE)
Experience: 910388/1000000 Level: 20 Size: Medium Speed: 30 Carry/Lift: 180/360
Ability Notes: Human Ability Adjustment: +1 Charisma/+1 Constitution/+1 Dexterity/+1 Intelligence/+1 Strength/+1 Wisdom
Features/Skills
Proficiency Bonus: 6
Feat Count: General: 5 Selectable Feature Count: Warlock (Eldritch Invocation): 8; Warlock (Otherworldly Patron): 1; Warlock (Pact Boon): 1
Feats: Great Weapon Master; Magic Initiate (Cleric); Polearm Master; Skilled; Tough Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment; Language (Common; Choose 1 from any) Warlock Features: Agonizing Blast; Armor Of Shadows; Armor Proficiency (Light); Ascendant Step; Awakened Mind; Beast Speech; Beguiling Defenses; Beguiling Influence; Bewitching Whispers; Book Of Ancient Secrets; Chains Of Carceri; Create Thrall; Dark Delirium; Dark One's Blessing; Dark One's Own Luck; Devil's Sight; Dreadful Word; Eldritch Invocations; Eldritch Master; Eldritch Sight; Eldritch Spear; Entropic Ward; Eyes Of The Rune Keeper; Fey Presence; Fiendish Resilience; Fiendish Vigor; Gaze Of Two Minds; Hurl Through Hell; Lifedrinker; Mask Of Many Faces; Master Of Myriad Forms; Minions Of Chaos; Mire The Mind; Misty Escape; Misty Visions; Mystic Arcanum; One With Shadows; Otherworldly Leap; Otherworldly Patron; Pact Boon; Pact Magic; Pact Of The Blade; Pact Of The Chain; Pact Of The Tome; Repelling Blast; Save Proficiency (Wisdom; Charisma); Sculptor Of Flesh; Sign Of Ill Omen; Skill Proficiency (Choose 2 from Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Investigation, Nature, Religion); The Archfey; The Fiend; The Great Old One; Thief Of Five Fates; Thirsting Blade; Thought Shield; Visions Of Distant Realms; Voice Of The Chain Master; Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons); Whispers Of The Grave; Witch Sight Acolyte Features: Language (Choose 2 from any); Shelter Of The Faithful; Skill Proficiency (Insight; Religion)
Feature Notes:
Otherworldly Patron: 1 selection
Pact Boon: 1 selection
Awakened Mind: R30' Can communicate telepathically
Dark One's Own Luck: Can add 1d10 to an ability or save roll once per short rest
Devil's Sight: R120' Sees normally in darkness
Eyes Of The Rune Keeper: Can read all writing
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of Greek-Hecate and fellow believers
Voice Of The Chain Master: Can perceive and speak through familiar and communicate telepathically with it
Witch Sight: R30' Sees true forms
Skill Proficiency: Animal Handling; Deception; History; Insight; Intimidation; Investigation; Persuasion; Religion
Skills:
Acrobatics: (dex) 1 Insight: (wis) 7 Performance: (cha) 1
Animal Handling: (wis) 7 Intimidation: (cha) 7 Persuasion: (cha) 7
Arcana: (int) 4 Investigation: (int) 10 Religion: (int) 10
Athletics: (str) 1 Medicine: (wis) 1 Sleight Of Hand: (dex) 1
Deception: (cha) 7 Nature: (int) 4 Stealth: (dex) 1
History: (int) 10 Perception: (wis) 1 Survival: (wis) 1
Languages: Common; Giant; Infernal; Primordial
Skill Notes:
Beguiling Influence: Skill Proficiency (Deception; Persuasion)
Skilled: Skill Proficiency (Choose 3 from any)
Bulky Armor: Has disadvantage on Stealth
Combat
Hit Points: 157 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 12 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Light Weapon Proficiency: Simple Weapons
Armor: Padded Shield: None Weapons: Javelin (+7 1d6+1 R30/120); Quarterstaff (+7 1d8+1); Unarmed (+7 1+1)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Tough: +40 Hit Points
Dark One's Blessing: Reducing a foe to 0 hit points gives self 21 temporary hit points
Entropic Ward: Can use a reaction to inflict disadvantage on an attacker once per short rest; a miss gives self advantage on the first attack on that foe until the end of the next turn
Great Weapon Master: Can use a bonus action to attack after scoring a critical hit or reducing a foe to 0 hit points with a melee weapon/Can make a -5 attack with a heavy weapon to inflict +10 damage
Hurl Through Hell: After a successful attack, can inflict 10d10 HP psychic and cause the target to disappear for 1 rd once per long rest
Lifedrinker: Pact weapon inflicts +1 HP necrotic
Pact Of The Chain: Can forego one attack to allow familiar to attack as a reaction
Polearm Master: Can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of a polearm, inflicting 1d4 HP bludgeoning, and a foe entering polearm reach provokes an opportunity attack
Thirsting Blade: Attack action with a pact blade allows 2 attacks
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 7; Constitution: 2; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 4; Strength: 1; Wisdom: 7
Save Notes:
Beguiling Defenses: Has immunity to charm and can reflect charm spells onto the caster (DC 15 Wisdom neg) for 1 min or until the caster takes damage
Fiendish Resilience: At the end of a rest, can gain resistance to a chosen damage type from non-magical and non-silver weapons
Thought Shield: Has immunity to telepathy and resistance to psychic damage, and taking psychic damage inflicts equal damage on the attacker
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 2; C1: 1; K0: 4; K5: 4 Attack: C: 7; K: 7 Spell DC: C: 15; K: 15
Spells:
Alter Self (K2 [Master Of Myriad Forms] Tran): Self becomes aquatic, changes appearance, or gains magic natural weapons with +1 attack and 1d6+ HP damage, for concentration up to 1 hr
Arcane Eye (K4 [Visions Of Distant Realms] Divi): R30' Self sees with darkvision through a remote invisible eye that can move 30' per rd for concentration up to 1 hr
Bane (K1 [Thief Of Five Fates] Ench): R30' 3 targets suffer -1d4 on attacks and saving throws (save Charisma neg) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Bestow Curse (K3 [Sign Of Ill Omen] Necr): Touched suffers a choice of disadvantage on specified ability rolls, disadvantage on attacks on self, requiring a successful Wisdom save to take any action, or +1d8 HP necrotic from self attacks (save Wisdom neg) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the maximum duration to 10 min, 8 hr, 24 hr, or permanently at level 4, 5, 7, or 9]
Chill Touch (K0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Compulsion (K4 [Bewitching Whispers] Ench): R30' Self controls target movement direction (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Confusion (K4 [Dreadful Word] Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly: 10% wander; 50% do nothing; 20% attack an adjacent creature; 20% act normally (save Wisdom neg) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level increases the radius by 5']
Conjure Elemental (K5 [Minions Of Chaos] Conj): R90' Summons an obedient environment-appropriate CR 5 elemental for 1 hr; loss of concentration makes it hostile [+Level increases the CR by 1]
Contact Other Plane (K5 Divi): Contact with an extraplanar being inflicts 6d6 HP psychic and insanity on self until a long rest (save DC 15 Intelligence neg and gives 5 one-word answers) [R]
Detect Magic (K1 [Eldritch Sight] Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Detect Poison And Disease (C1 Divi): R30' Reveals poison, poisonous creatures, and diseases for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Disguise Self (K1 [Mask Of Many Faces] Illu): Changes the appearance of self body and clothing for 1 hr; physical investigation detects the illusion
Dream (K5 Illu): Touched controls the dreams of a known target for 8 hr and can inflict 3d6 HP psychic (save Wisdom neg)
Eldritch Blast (K0 Evoc): R300' Ranged spell creates 4 rays that inflict 1d10 HP force each
False Life (K1 [Fiendish Vigor] Necr): Self gains 1d4+4 temporary hit points for 1 hr [+Level gives +5 temporary hit points]
Find Familiar (K1 [Pact Of The Chain] Conj): R10' Self gains the service of a summoned spirit in animal form that can deliver touch attacks when within 100' [R]
Flame Strike (K5 [The Fiend] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP radiant (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP of a choice of fire or radiant]
Friends (K0 Ench): Self gains on advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Hold Monster (K5 Ench): R90' Immobilizes the target creature (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hold Monster (K5 [Chains Of Carceri] Ench): R90' Immobilizes the target creature (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Jump (K1 [Otherworldly Leap] Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Levitate (K2 [Ascendant Step] Tran): R60' Target floats (save Constitution neg) and can be moved up or down 20' each rd for concentration up to 10 min
Mage Armor (K1 [Armor Of Shadows] Abju): Willing, unarmored touched gains AC 13 + Dexterity modifier for 8 hr; the spell ends if the target dons armor
Poison Spray (K0 Conj): R10' Inflicts 4d12 HP poison (save Constitution neg)
Polymorph (K4 [Sculptor Of Flesh] Tran): R60' Transforms the target creature (save Wisdom neg; shapechangers automatically succeed) for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Sacred Flame (C0 Evoc): R60' Inflicts 4d8 HP radiant (save Dexterity neg)
Silent Image (K1 [Misty Visions] Illu): R60' Creates a 15' cube movable illusion (Investigation detects) for concentration up to 10 min
Slow (K3 [Mire The Mind] Tran): R120' 6 targets in a 40' cube suffer half Speed, -2 AC and Dexterity saves, loss of reactions, and no more than 1 action per rd (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Speak With Animals (K1 [Beast Speech] Divi): Self can talk with animals for 10 min [R]
Speak With Dead (K3 [Whispers Of The Grave] Necr): R10' Self can ask a corpse 5 questions; the corpse is then immune for 10 days
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects—a booming voice, modification of flames, harmless tremors, an illusory sound, movement of a door or window, or a change in eye appearance—for 1 min
Magic Notes:
Eldritch Invocations: 8 selections
Eldritch Spear: Increases Eldritch Blast range to 300'
Magic Initiate (Cleric): Knows 2 cleric cantrips/Can cast a chosen C1 spell once per long rest
Agonizing Blast: Eldritch Blast inflicts +1 HP
Armor Of Shadows: Can cast Mage Armor on self at will
Ascendant Step: Can cast Levitate on self at will
Beast Speech: Can cast Speak With Animals at will
Bewitching Whispers: Can use a Warlock spell slot to cast Compulsion once per long rest
Book Of Ancient Secrets: Has 2 1st-level spell rituals inscribed in a Book Of Shadows and can inscribe additional rituals
Chains Of Carceri: Can cast Hold Monster at will on celestials, elementals, and fiends once per long rest per creature
Create Thrall: Touch charms an incapacitated humanoid and allows telepathic communication with it
Dark Delirium: R60' Inflicts charmed or frightened and unaware of surroundings (DC 15 Wisdom neg) for concentration up to 1 min once per short rest
Dreadful Word: Can use a Warlock spell slot to cast Confusion once per long rest
Eldritch Master: Can recover expended spell slots once per long rest
Eldritch Sight: Can cast Detect Magic at will
Fey Presence: Can inflict a choice of charmed or frightened (DC 15 Wisdom neg) for 1 rd on all creatures in a 10' cube once per short rest
Fiendish Vigor: Can cast False Life on self at will
Gaze Of Two Minds: Touch allows self to perceive through the senses of a willing humanoid while maintained
Mask Of Many Faces: Can cast Disguise Self at will
Master Of Myriad Forms: Can cast Alter Self at will
Minions Of Chaos: Can use a Warlock spell slot to cast Conjure Elemental once per long rest
Mire The Mind: Can use a Warlock spell slot to cast Slow once per long rest
Misty Escape: Can use a reaction upon taking damage to teleport 60' and become invisible for 1 rd once per short rest; attacking or casting ends
Misty Visions: Can cast Silent Image at will
Mystic Arcanum: Can cast chosen K6, K7, K8, and K9 spells without using a spell slot once per long rest
One With Shadows: Can become invisible in dim light; moving or taking an action or reaction ends
Otherworldly Leap: Can cast Jump on self at will
Pact Magic: Can cast spells from the warlock spell list
Pact Of The Blade: Can use an action to conjure a magic weapon or use a 1 hr ritual to make a magic weapon summonable
Pact Of The Chain: Can cast Find Familiar as a ritual
Pact Of The Tome: Has a Book Of Shadows containing 3 chosen cantrips from any spell lists that can be cast at will
Repelling Blast: Can inflict a 10' push with a successful Eldritch Blast
Sculptor Of Flesh: Can use a Warlock spell slot to cast Polymorph once per long rest
Sign Of Ill Omen: Can use a Warlock spell slot to cast Bestow Curse once per long rest
Thief Of Five Fates: Can use a warlock spell slot to cast Bane once per long rest
Visions Of Distant Realms: Can cast Arcane Eye at will
Whispers Of The Grave: Can cast Speak With Dead at will
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 10 available vs. 38 allocated
